gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: Core Backend Complete
criteria: 80%+ unit test coverage for Jint service; All sandbox constraint tests passing; Security review of sandbox configuration approved.
success_metrics: Zero critical security findings in sandbox implementation.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: API & Data Layer Complete
criteria: All script CRUD API integration tests passing; Encryption integration test passing; Data size limit test passing.
success_metrics: All API endpoints are functional, secure, and meet the defined contract.

criteria: All E2E tests for script management and preview workflows passing; Manual accessibility audit (WCAG 2.1 AA) completed and passed for all new UI.
bypass_criteria: Minor, non-blocking UI bugs are acceptable with associated tickets created.
success_metrics: Feature is functionally complete and meets usability and accessibility standards.

criteria: Performance benchmark test (REQ-PERF-DTR-002) passes on dedicated runner; Successful DR test (REQ-OPER-DTR-002) completed; Migration script dry-run successful (REQ-OPER-IMP-002).
success_metrics: All non-functional requirements for performance, reliability, and operations are met.
